    public class ProfileWindow

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProfileWindow

        public ProfileWindow()
        Opens a ProfileWindow with no previous profiles.

      • ProfileWindow

        public ProfileWindow(java.util.Collection<Profile> profiles)
        Constructs a new ProfileWindow and adds the profiles as "already-selected". The point is that when you cancel at a later stage (e.g. level-selection) you can add the profiles the user selected before so the window looks like how you left it and you don't have to reselect all profiles.
        Parameters:
        profiles - The profiles to display as "already-selected".

    • Method Detail

      • profiles

        public java.util.List<Profile> profiles()
        Returns:
        The selected profiles. Empty if none yet.

      • _createExtraPlayerSlot

        private void _createExtraPlayerSlot()
        Creates a new slot for adding a profile. Such a slot includes a button for creating a new profile or selecting an existing one. It also takes care of first removing the bottom slot (done/cancel/add-player) and then re-adding at the bottom (below the new player slot).

      • _createPlayerSlot

        private void _createPlayerSlot(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel slot)
        Creates the slot for adding a new player or choosing an existing one.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to which to add the buttons.

      • _createNewProfileButton

        private void _createNewProfileButton(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel slot)
        Creates the button for creating a new profile.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to which to add the button.

      • _createExistingProfileButton

        Creates th button for choosing an existing profile.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to which to add the button.

        Manages creating a new profile.
        Parameters:

      • _getExistingProfile

        private void _getExistingProfile(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel slot)
        Manages selecting an existing profile from a file dialog.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to which to add the selected id, if not cancelled.

      • _addProfile

        private void _addProfile(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel slot,
                         Profile profile)
        Manages adding a new player to a slot. Handles things like duplicate profile selection and handling keymap conflicts.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to add the player ID to.
        profile - The relevant profile.

      • _openFileDialog

        private java.io.File _openFileDialog()
        Opens a file dialog for selection.
        Returns:
        The selected file, if any.

      • _showEmptinessMessage

        private void _showEmptinessMessage()
        Shows a message to let the user know that no profiles have been selected yet, which is bad. This happens when the user presses "Done" without having created or chosen a profile.

      • _checkKeyMapConflicts

        private void _checkKeyMapConflicts(Profile profile)
        Checks if the profile selected has a keymap conflicting with any previously selected profile. If so, shows a warning message that one of them will not be able to move in the game.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile to check the keymap of.

      • _addProfileRemoveButton

        private void _addProfileRemoveButton(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel slot,
                                     Profile profile)
        Ads the button for removing a profile after having selected one. When a profile is de-selected, it is replaced with the slot to add a create a new profile or select an existing one.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to make the modifications to.
        profile - The newly selected player.
